description:
We're getting together to watch the film "Terms And Conditions May Apply" (IMDb: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt2084953/)

The Arts House is a very chilled venue on Stokes Croft with their own mini-cinema downstairs, and a great bar/cafe upstairs. No doubt we'll retire there afterwards for a bit of a chat.

There will be a £2 charge on the door to cover the venue's costs.
title: Film night: "Terms and Conditions May Apply"
